email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12000MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

I hope you're doing well. We have an inquiry for shipping 12000MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under CFR terms. The MV OCEAN HORIZON is currently available and could be positioned for this shipment. Could you confirm her current position and expected availability? Also, could you provide an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12000MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for your inquiry. The MV OCEAN HORIZON is currently in Antwerp and could be repositioned to Rotterdam for your laycan, ideally starting from October 20. The initial freight quote for the shipment would be USD 45.50 per metric tonne. This rate includes fuel but excludes any potential demurrage charges.

Let me know your thoughts or if you need further details!
Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Jane,

Thank you for the prompt response and details. The rate of USD 45.50 seems a bit high considering current market conditions. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates applicable and the expected loading window in Rotterdam?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 43.75 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, and the loading window in Rotterdam is expected to be 3 days, weather permitting.

Let me know if this works for you.
Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12000MT - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Hello Jane,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the rate of USD 43.75 per metric tonne. Please confirm the laycan dates and send over the contract details.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12000MT - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great to hear that the rate works for you. The laycan dates are confirmed for October 20-23. I will send over the contract details shortly.

Best regards,
Jane Smith
